name: 賀一平
objective:
認識通俗科技文章及科技學術論文語法、文體、結構組織等特質，並探討技術報告及論文撰寫方式。
本課程授課包括約三分之一的時間在語言教室練習職場英語。
schedule:
Week 　　　　Topic
1, 2, 3　　Structure of Technical, Scientific English (Sentence Patterns): Definition, Cause and Effect, Comparison and Contrast, Classification, Exemplification, Description; Key Words in Science and Technology: (1) Research, Discovery, and Innovation, and (2) The Environment
4, 5, 6　　Rhetoric Patterns in Technical English (Patterns of Organization): Definition, Classification/Division, Cause and Effect, Comparison/Contrast, Process, Description; Key Words in Science and Technology: (3) Information Technology, (4) Medicine, and (5) Genetics
7, 8, 9　　Revision for Readability: Revision for Accuracy, Conciseness and Clarity; Key Words in Science and Technology: (6) Physics and (7) Space
10　　Mid-term Examination
11-12　　Informal Reports: Recommendation Reports, Progress/Periodical Reports, Feasibility Reports
13　　Formal Reports
14　　Proposals
15-17　　Writing a Research Paper: Abstract, Introduction, Materials and Methods, Results and Discussion
18　　Final Examination/Oral Presentation
scorePolicy:
Evaluation:
Writing tasks and oral presentations: 50%
Examinations: 30%
Technical report or proposal: 20%
